main.name: Joseph Salvador
main.description: Testing Engineer by Day, Reality Hacker & Freelancer by Night.
main.bio: My name is Joe, I'm an aspiring Developer. Currently I'm available for your project while also Making the transition from Retail Management to the Information Technology Sector. I have over ten years of experience of managing small teams of people with the main goal of ensuring the best consumer experience. Documented experience in soft skills such as Verbal Communication, Time Management, and Art Content Creation. HR, accounting, clerical and softskills are a given being a retail manager. Years of proven Troubleshooting experience and mentoring that could be an asset to your Vision
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: Skilled in project and team management, proven in multiple sectors of industry. React, Bootstrap, JS, HTML, CSS, and other skills available upon request

education.description: Graduated with Certificate as apart of pilot program

work.title: Team Member & React Specialist
work.description: Teaching Art and React to thousands of students.

work.title: Social Media Manager
work.description: Grew Brand Presence and introduced them into the YouTube market. Apart of the team that relaunched the revamped new site and coordinated email campaigns. Also apart of the team that pushed Higher Balance to publish their most successful book to date: Presient Visions. Art, copy, and profile design in the standard formats. Leading Role on the setup of their hit podcast Rebel Guru Radio

projects.title: MERN Stack WhatsApp Clone

testimonials.text: Joe got me setup and ready to go in days.
Joe has one of the most brilliant minds I've ever met, can't wait until he builds what he wants someday,
